subject: Copyrights and Copyright Violations
Video Recordings, Downloads and Streaming
Football
Social Media
lead_paragraph: Hundreds of videos were flagged during Week 5 of the N.F.L. But the breadth of the Internet suggests that the full extent of the unauthorized use of N.F.L. videos is unknown — and may never be.
